variations.description: Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 36% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 42% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 48% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 54% of ATK.
Attacks all enemies 3 times, each time dealing Physical DMG equal to 60% of ATK.
For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to 30% of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for 12% of the DMG dealt.
For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to 35% of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for 14% of the DMG dealt.
For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to 40% of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for 16% of the DMG dealt.
For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to 45% of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for 18% of the DMG dealt.
For the next 10 seconds, when dealing Physical DMG, inflicts extra damage equal to 50% of Nocturna's ATK, and heals herself for 20% of the DMG dealt.
Deals 1% more damage with each attack. Can stack up to 20%.
Deals 2% more damage with each attack. Can stack up to 40%.
